description: Documentation generation tasks for the Kubernetes codebase, evaluating an agent's ability to read large Go packages and produce accurate doc.go files

criteria.name: Technical Accuracy
criteria.description: Correctness of APIs, data structures, behavior, package/path references

criteria.name: Completeness
criteria.description: Coverage of major concepts, edge cases, and scope appropriateness

criteria.name: Style Conformance
criteria.description: Adherence to Go doc conventions and Kubernetes style

criteria.name: Ground Truth Alignment
criteria.description: How well generated content aligns with reference documentation
